<div class="flex items-center justify-center mt-6">
  <button id="checkout-button" class="bg-blue-600 text-white font-semibold py-2 px-6 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-700 transition duration-200">
    Buy Now
  </button>
</div>

<script src="https://js.stripe.com/v3/"></script>
<script>
  // Initialize Stripe with your Publishable Key
  const stripe = Stripe('pk_test_51MPasYFVqC8fbxB6I1qKcWMOsSmaeC01Jj5mDS338M7R1IHktUdh3wReovg6BGKsPH8b0Hl3s6m2lHwfdJ2kue3v00N0ZT6GhC'); // Replace with your TEST mode Stripe Publishable Key

  // Handle button click
  const checkoutButton = document.getElementById('checkout-button');
  checkoutButton.addEventListener('click', async () => {
    try {
      // Call the serverless function to create a Checkout Session
      const response = await fetch('https://proofbound-stripe.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/create-checkout-session', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          priceId: 'price_1RUbGMFVqC8fbxB65a0ANhrl', // Your price ID
          successUrl: 'https://proofbound.com/success.html',
          cancelUrl: 'https://proofbound.com/cancel.html',
        }),
      });

      const session = await response.json();

      if (session.error) {
        console.error('Error from serverless:', session.error);
        alert('Failed to initiate payment. Please try again.');
        return;
      }

      // Redirect to Stripe Checkout
      const error = await stripe.redirectToCheckout({ sessionId: session.id });
      if (error) {
        console.error('Error redirecting to Checkout:', error);
        alert('Failed to initiate payment. Please try again.');
      }
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Error:', err);
      alert('An error occurred. Please try again later.');
    }
  });
</script>
